1.12.2.1.1: This is a major internal rewrite whose purpose is to make Chameleon independent from GeckoLib.
1.12.2.1.0.3: This is a small patch has 2 features and bug fixes.
1.12.2.1.0.2: This is a small patch that is required for new versions of McLib.
1.12.2.1.0.1: Quick hotfix to fix Chameleon mod to work with another more popular Chameleon mod.
1.12.2.1.0: First version of Chameleon mod. This version provides essential tools to work with Chameleon animated morphs.
